channel.title: Need Help With NPC's facing direction
channel.description: This is probably simple but I need to know how to make npc's face a diffrent direction besides south.... Well if you have an anwser please help.

item.title: Need Help With NPC's facing direction
item.dc:creator: @x_d_slayer_x x d slayer x
item.description:
@x_d_slayer_x wrote:

ok its pretty simple ,look at the bar above the screen where it says maplock and other things.go to maplock and choose unlock.and there you have it.

Read full topic
